value_claims.claim_title: Revenue increase of over 20% from new mobile app
value_claims.claim_description: IHG's redesigned mobile app achieved revenue growth exceeding 20% compared to pre-pandemic metrics as of September 2022, following launch in May 2022.
value_claims.source_quote: As of September 2022—compared to pre-pandemic metrics—revenue, usage and downloads are all up more than 20% and growing.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The app includes AI-powered features like personalized home screens and digital concierge, but the revenue lift is attributed to the overall app redesign and improved user experience.

value_claims.claim_description: The redesigned IHG One Rewards mobile app saw usage increase by more than 20% compared to pre-pandemic levels as of September 2022.
value_claims.source_quote: As of September 2022—compared to pre-pandemic metrics—revenue, usage and downloads are all up more than 20% and growing.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Usage growth driven by improved UX and personalization features including AI-powered elements like digital concierge and personalized recommendations.

value_claims.claim_description: Downloads of the IHG One Rewards mobile app increased by more than 20% compared to pre-pandemic metrics as of September 2022.
value_claims.source_quote: As of September 2022—compared to pre-pandemic metrics—revenue, usage and downloads are all up more than 20% and growing.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Download growth attributed to enhanced app features including AI-powered personalization and improved user experience.

value_claims.claim_title: 4.9-star app rating making it top-rated travel app
value_claims.claim_description: The IHG One Rewards app achieved a 4.9-star rating in the iOS app store, positioning it as a top-rated travel app with customers describing it as easy to navigate.
value_claims.source_quote: And as a testament to usability, it has a 4.9-star rating in the iOS app store, making it a top-rated travel app. Customer reviews describe the app as 'easy to navigate' with a 'stunning new design.'
value_claims.attribution_evidence: High rating reflects overall app quality including AI-powered personalization features, digital concierge, and improved user experience.

value_claims.claim_description: The redesigned IHG mobile app achieved near-perfect crash-free performance, contributing to improved user experience and reliability.
value_claims.source_quote: The app is also faster and has near-perfect, crash-free performance.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Performance improvement primarily due to infrastructure modernization, though AI features benefit from the stable platform.

value_claims.claim_title: GenAI travel planner enables personalized destination discovery
value_claims.claim_description: IHG's GenAI-powered travel planner helps guests discover destinations across 6,000+ hotels in 100+ countries, answering nuanced queries about dining, amenities, and local events.
value_claims.source_quote: Our customized travel planner will use GenAI to help people discover destinations among our more than 6,000 IHG hotels across 19 brands in over 100 countries
value_claims.quote_location: Quote from Jolie Fleming, Chief Product & Technology Officer
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The travel planner capability is explicitly powered by GenAI using Vertex AI and Google's Gemini models to provide personalized recommendations.

value_claims.claim_title: AI-powered travel planner simplifies trip planning and booking
value_claims.claim_description: The GenAI travel planner enables guests to build full itineraries and book hotels in a few taps, making trip planning easier and more interactive.
value_claims.source_quote: Soon, guests will use the IHG One Rewards mobile app as a true mobile travel companion to build a full itinerary and book hotels in a few taps.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The simplified booking process is directly enabled by GenAI-powered travel planning capabilities using Vertex AI and Gemini models.

value_claims.claim_title: Enhanced self-service options through AI capabilities
value_claims.claim_description: Genesys AI capabilities enable IHG to enhance self-service options in contact centers, optimizing operations and creating more seamless guest interactions.
value_claims.source_quote: Genesys is enabling IHG to optimize operations, enhance self-service options and create more seamless guest interactions.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Self-service enhancement is explicitly attributed to next-generation AI capabilities through the Genesys Cloud platform.

value_claims.claim_title: Zero downtime migration of thousands of agents and phone numbers
value_claims.claim_description: IHG executed one of its largest customer experience center transformations, migrating thousands of agents and toll-free numbers across eight global sites without any downtime.
value_claims.source_quote: Recently, IHG executed one of its largest-ever customer experience center transformations, migrating thousands of guest services agents and thousands of toll-free numbers across eight global sites— without any downtime.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Migration success enabled by Genesys Cloud platform which includes AI capabilities, but the zero-downtime achievement is primarily an infrastructure accomplishment.

value_claims.claim_title: Faster guest response times through intelligent routing
value_claims.claim_description: Genesys Cloud's intelligent routing capabilities help IHG guests get answers faster, improving response times across contact center operations.
value_claims.source_quote: Behind the scenes, an enormous network of people, platforms and phone lines came together to ensure guests get answers faster than they can say, 'Late checkout, please.'
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Faster response times directly attributed to intelligent routing capabilities, which are AI-powered features of the Genesys Cloud platform.

value_claims.claim_title: Mobile app became fastest-growing booking channel
value_claims.claim_description: IHG's mobile app has become the company's fastest-growing booking channel following investments in personalization and AI-driven features.
value_claims.source_quote: The company has invested heavily in its IHG One Rewards mobile app, which has become its fastest-growing booking channel.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Growth driven by multiple factors including AI-powered personalization features, but also broader app improvements and user experience enhancements.

value_claims.claim_title: Increased hotel revenue from upselling through personalization
value_claims.claim_description: IHG's technological advancements including personalized booking experiences enable hotels to see increased revenue from upselling opportunities.
value_claims.source_quote: These technological advancements are benefiting both guests and hoteliers. Guests enjoy a more personalized and seamless travel experience, while hotels see increased revenue from upselling and enhanced guest satisfaction.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Revenue increase from upselling enabled by personalized booking platform and AI-driven recommendations, though part of broader technology platform improvements.
